```{r setup, include=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("C:/Users/Correy/Desktop/cmpt310/cmpt-310/final_project/winTracker.csv", sep = ",", header = TRUE)
```


```{r}
newdata1 <- subset(data, select = c(MCTS, Playouts, Language))
newdata2 <- subset(data, select = c(PMCTS, Playouts, Language))
newdata3 <- subset(data, select = c(Alpha.Beta, Playouts, Language))
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(newdata1, aes(x=log(Playouts), y=MCTS, group=Language)) +
  geom_line(aes(color=Language))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Language))
ggplot(newdata2, aes(x=log(Playouts), y=PMCTS, group=Language)) +
  geom_line(aes(color=Language))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Language))
ggplot(newdata3, aes(x=log(Playouts), y=Alpha.Beta, group=Language)) +
  geom_line(aes(color=Language))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Language))
```
